titleInfo.title: TEMPLATE-CONTROLLED FORMATION OF CLUSTER SHELLS OR A TYPE OF MOLECULAR RECOGNITION - SYNTHESIS OF [HV22O54(CLO4)]6- AND [H2V18O44(N3)]5-

mods.abstract: Anions as templates for ''host'' anions determine the shape of molecular cavities (cluster shells) which form from differently coupled tetragonal-pyramidal OVO4 building blocks. For example, in the case of the cluster anions [HV22O54(ClO4)]6- and [H2V18O44(N3)]5- (depicted on the right) the construction of the cluster shells are achieved by ''recognition'' of the (O-O)2- or N(N)N units.

bibliographicCitation.aps: A. Müller, et al., TEMPLATE-CONTROLLED FORMATION OF CLUSTER SHELLS OR A TYPE OF MOLECULAR RECOGNITION - SYNTHESIS OF [HV22O54(CLO4)]6- AND [H2V18O44(N3)]5-, ANGEWANDTE CHEMIE-INTERNATIONAL EDITION IN ENGLISH 30, 1674-1677 (1991).
